title: Drugs, Grooming & Conspiracy Theories: What Baz Luhrmann's "Elvis" Left Out
itunes:title: Drugs, Grooming & Conspiracy Theories: What Baz Luhrmann's "Elvis" Left Out
description:
This week we're walking you all through Baz Luhrmann's new film Elvis, the complexity of the artist and man Elvis Presley and why Elvis is getting cancelled (again). Join us as we deep dive into some of Elvis's problematic behaviors from reports of him grooming his wife to appropriating black music, how he was screwed by his manager, his struggles with opioids and the conspiracy theories surrounding his early death.


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
